name: Plinko 360 - 0.1 Release (Andriod)
description:
Part of my one game a month quest. 

Plinko 360 is meant to be a causal time wasting game to enjoy on your phone. :)

Slide Left and Right on the screen to spin the level picking up coins and trying to make it to the goal. 

Didn't make it to the polish  and juice stage :(  but I hope to continue cleaning it up!
